description.en: CIA Protocol (CIA) is a privacy centric portal into DeFi by integrating ZK-SNARKs with an AMM. CIA aims to diversify trading options for the DeFi community on the leading blockchains by offering a privacy DEX with additional featurs such as private lending/borrowing, yield farming & rewards for active network participants via the native token – CIA.
